title: How much do UK parents spend on education technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: I dont know about the spending on education but i reasearched alittle bit about the topic of education and i can give you a top educational countries list :Top 4 not in order:South korea , Japan , China , Taiwan Top 5-9 not in order : Irland , Poland , USA , UK , Israel  What I do know is that the UK is in many lists only because of its good universities otherwise it would have been top 20. This list is based on many lists combined and especially on one list which was based on university graduates per cap , reaserches published per cap/not cap I'm not sure , and quotes of this reaserches in other reaserches.
